titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning May 9, 2010, as "National Nursing Home Week".
A resolution designating the week beginning May 9, 2010, as "National Nursing Home Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the week beginning May 9, 2010, as National Nursing Home Week.
Recognizes that a majority of people in the United States will require long-term care services at some point.
Honors nursing home residents and the people who care for them.
